channel.title: 317 Pi custom Thiefing
channel.description: okay so basically im using 317 PI its optic-pkz source im trying to figure out how to add custom thiefing for example: if you picpocket a hero he will give you: 1% chance of phat 10% chance whip 100% chance of 50k i have it so i thief him and he gives 50k just dont know were i would start to add the custom thiefing what .java file would it be in?

item.description:
@darknessxd wrote:

okay so basically im using 317 PI its optic-pkz source im trying to figure out how to add custom thiefing
for example:
if you picpocket a hero he will give you:
1% chance of phat
10% chance whip
100% chance of 50k
i have it so i thief him and he gives 50k just dont know were i would start to add the custom thiefing what .java file would it be in?
